summary: Worn Steel Retex Made Standalone and Craftable
descriptionHtml:
I did not create this skin all the REAL hardwork was done by Jonesha, i have simply made it a standalone, craftable and temperable version.

There should be no issues, works with all races.

Heres the original retex version > worn steel dwarven armor retexture
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6621

For Manual Install

Place Esp in > Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Place Textures And Meshes Into relevent folders

Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\armor\\dwarvensteel
Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\armor\\dwarvensteel

Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\weapons\\dwarvensteel
Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\weapons\\dwarvensteel
author: zaph72
